title: Biden to nominate new ATF director, release ghost gun rule - The Associated Press
content: Biden to nominate new ATF director, release ghost gun rule  The Associated PressView Full Coverage on Google News
description: WASHINGTON (AP) â€” President Joe Biden is nominating an Obama-era U.S. attorney to run the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives, as his administration unveils its formal rule to rein in ghost guns, privately made firearms without serial numbers that are increasingly cropping up at crime scenes, six people familiar with the matter told The Associated Press.
